PARAMETER.NAME: USE_KRB
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: isShow[DISTRIBUTION] AND ((((HBASE_VERSION=='APACHE_1_0_0') OR (HBASE_VERSION=='APACHE_1_0_3_EMR') OR (HBASE_VERSION=='PIVOTAL_HD_2_0')) AND (DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM')) OR (DISTRIBUTION=='HORTONWORKS') OR (DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM') OR ((DISTRIBUTION=='CLOUDERA') AND (HBASE_VERSION!='Cloudera_CDH3')))

IMPORT.NAME: hbase-0.92.0.jar
IMPORT.REQUIRED_IF: (HBASE_VERSION=='APACHE_1_0_0' OR HBASE_VERSION=='APACHE_1_0_3_EMR' OR HBASE_VERSION=='HDP_1_0') and (USE_EXISTING_CONNECTION == 'false') AND (DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM')

IMPORT.NAME: zookeeper-3.4.2.jar
IMPORT.REQUIRED_IF: (HBASE_VERSION=='APACHE_1_0_0' OR HBASE_VERSION=='APACHE_1_0_3_EMR' OR HBASE_VERSION=='HDP_1_0') and (USE_EXISTING_CONNECTION == 'false') AND (DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM')

IMPORT.NAME: commons-configuration-1.6.jar
IMPORT.REQUIRED_IF: (HBASE_VERSION=='APACHE_1_0_0' OR HBASE_VERSION=='APACHE_1_0_3_EMR' OR HBASE_VERSION=='HDP_1_0') and (USE_EXISTING_CONNECTION == 'false') AND (DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM')

IMPORT.NAME: commons-lang-2.4.jar
IMPORT.REQUIRED_IF: ( HBASE_VERSION=='APACHE_0_20_203' or HBASE_VERSION=='APACHE_1_0_0' OR HBASE_VERSION=='APACHE_1_0_3_EMR' OR HBASE_VERSION=='HDP_1_0') and (USE_EXISTING_CONNECTION == 'false') AND (DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM')

IMPORT.NAME: commons-logging-1.1.1.jar
IMPORT.REQUIRED_IF: (HBASE_VERSION=='APACHE_1_0_0' OR HBASE_VERSION=='APACHE_1_0_3_EMR' OR HBASE_VERSION=='HDP_1_0') and (USE_EXISTING_CONNECTION == 'false') AND (DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM')

IMPORT.NAME: hadoop-core-1.0.0.jar
IMPORT.REQUIRED_IF: (HBASE_VERSION=='APACHE_1_0_0' OR HBASE_VERSION=='APACHE_1_0_3_EMR' OR HBASE_VERSION=='HDP_1_0') and (USE_EXISTING_CONNECTION == 'false') AND (DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM')

IMPORT.NAME: log4j-1.2.15.jar
IMPORT.REQUIRED_IF: (HBASE_VERSION=='APACHE_1_0_0' OR HBASE_VERSION=='APACHE_1_0_3_EMR' OR HBASE_VERSION=='HDP_1_0') and (USE_EXISTING_CONNECTION == 'false') AND (DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM')

IMPORT.NAME: slf4j-api-1.6.1.jar
IMPORT.REQUIRED_IF: (HBASE_VERSION=='APACHE_1_0_0' OR HBASE_VERSION=='APACHE_1_0_3_EMR' OR HBASE_VERSION=='HDP_1_0') and (USE_EXISTING_CONNECTION == 'false') AND (DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM')

IMPORT.NAME: slf4j-log4j12-1.6.1.jar
IMPORT.REQUIRED_IF: (HBASE_VERSION=='APACHE_1_0_0' OR HBASE_VERSION=='APACHE_1_0_3_EMR' OR HBASE_VERSION=='HDP_1_0') and (USE_EXISTING_CONNECTION == 'false') AND (DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM')

IMPORT.NAME: hadoop-conf-kerberos
IMPORT.REQUIRED_IF: (HBASE_VERSION=='HDP_1_0' OR HBASE_VERSION=='HDP_1_2' OR HBASE_VERSION=='HDP_1_3' OR HBASE_VERSION=='HDP_2_0' OR HBASE_VERSION=='HDP_2_1' OR HBASE_VERSION=='HDP_2_2' OR HBASE_VERSION=='APACHE_1_0_0' OR HBASE_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH4' OR HBASE_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH4_YARN' OR HBASE_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH5' OR HBASE_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH5_1' OR HBASE_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH5_1_MR1' OR HBASE_VERSION=='PIVOTAL_HD_2_0') AND (USE_KRB=='true') AND (USE_EXISTING_CONNECTION=='false') AND (DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM')
